weibo.text:
i am now an independent artist for the first time in 6+ years and the first time in my professional career. all i have ever wanted to do was create art that i’m passionate about and release albums that im proud of. i know you have all waited a very long time for me to release my debut and trust me, i have too. it has just been completely out of my hands … but not anymore ♡ 
i am so beyond appreciative of your patience and support but i please ask for you to be just a little more patient with me as i find my footing on this new journey. i promise i am going to give it my absolute all and i can’t wait to do this for the love of music and art and creativity ◡̈ 
HERE’S TO OWNING MY DEBUT ALBUM !!! ♡ 🐦⬛🩸
lighting it up for the finals of The Next Singer 2024 !!! cannot wait to sing with this incredible talent @李佩玲J ♡#下一战歌手总决赛##下一战歌手直通之夜##下一战歌手#
weibo.topics: 下一战歌手总决赛,下一战歌手直通之夜,下一战歌手
